description.zh-cn: 1870年法兰西第二帝国在普法战争中崩溃后建立的政体，直到1940年7月10日法国在第二次世界大战中被纳粹德国击败而终结。
description.en: The political regime in France from 1870, when the Second French Empire collapsed during the Franco-Prussian War, until 10 July 1940, after France's defeat by Nazi Germany in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，法兰西第三共和国的创始人之一，在普法战争期间宣布成立国防政府。
description.en: French statesman, one of the founders of the French Third Republic, who proclaimed the Government of National Defense during the Franco-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，由菲利普·贝当元帅领导的法国政府，与纳粹德国合作。
description.en: The French state headed by Marshal Philippe Pétain during World War II, which collaborated with Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1870年至1871年普鲁士王国与法兰西第二帝国之间的战争，导致法国战败和德意志帝国统一。
description.en: A conflict between the Second French Empire and the German states of the North German Confederation led by the Kingdom of Prussia from 1870 to 1871, resulting in a French defeat and the unification of Germany.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑三世统治的法兰西帝国政权，在普法战争中崩溃。
description.en: The Imperial Bonapartist regime of Napoleon III from 1852 to 1870, which collapsed during the Franco-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年间阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国。
description.en: Germany between 1933 and 1945, when Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party controlled the country.

description.zh-cn: 法国元帅，第一次世界大战的英雄，后成为维希法国的领导人。
description.en: French general officer who attained the position of Marshal of France, a hero of World War I who later became the leader of Vichy France.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家和历史学家，法兰西第三共和国的第一任总统。
description.en: French politician and historian who served as the first president of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1871年普法战争后，巴黎工人和国民警卫队建立的激进左翼政权，后被梯也尔政府血腥镇压。
description.en: A radical socialist, anti-religious, and revolutionary government that ruled Paris from 18 March to 28 May 1871, before being brutally suppressed by Thiers' government.

description.zh-cn: 法国将军和政治家，在镇压巴黎公社后当选为法兰西第三共和国的第二任总统。
description.en: French general and politician who, after suppressing the Paris Commune, was elected as the second President of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法国将军和政治家，其政治运动（布朗热主义）在1889年引发了一场威胁到法兰西第三共和国的政治危机。
description.en: French general and politician whose political movement, Boulangism, instigated a political crisis in 1889 that threatened the Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 一场重大的政治丑闻，涉及对犹太裔炮兵军官阿尔弗雷德·德雷福斯的叛国罪错判，深刻地分裂了法国社会。
description.en: A major political scandal involving the wrongful conviction for treason of Alfred Dreyfus, a Jewish artillery officer, which deeply divided French society.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔萨斯犹太后裔的法国炮兵军官，德雷福斯事件的核心人物。
description.en: A French artillery officer of Alsatian Jewish descent who was the central figure in the Dreyfus affair.

description.zh-cn: 法国著名作家，在德雷福斯事件中发表公开信《我控诉…！》为德雷福斯辩护。
description.en: A prominent French writer who defended Dreyfus by publishing the open letter 'J'Accuse…!' during the Dreyfus affair.

en: 1905 French law on the Separation of the Churches and the State

description.zh-cn: 1905年12月颁布的法律，正式将法国的教会与国家分离，废除了1801年教务专约。
description.en: A law passed in December 1905 that officially separated church and state in France, abrogating the Concordat of 1801.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大的基督教教会，在法兰西第三共和国时期与共和政府关系紧张。
description.en: The largest Christian church, which had a tense relationship with the republican government during the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法国和俄罗斯帝国之间的军事联盟，是法国为孤立德国而建立的外交体系的一部分。
description.en: A military alliance between the French Third Republic and the Russian Empire, part of France's diplomatic system to isolate Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1721年至1917年俄国革命期间存在的帝国。
description.en: An empire that existed from 1721 until the Russian Revolution in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 法国和英国之间的一系列协议，标志着两国间间歇性冲突的结束，并为对抗德国的三国协约奠定了基础。
description.en: A series of agreements signed between the United Kingdom and the French Republic, marking the end of intermittent conflict between the two nations and paving the way for the Triple Entente against Germany.

description.zh-cn: 历史上最大的帝国，在19世纪和20世纪初是全球性的主导力量。
description.en: The largest empire in history and the dominant global power for much of the 19th and early 20th centuries.

description.zh-cn: 一场主要发生在欧洲的全球性战争，协约国（包括法国）战胜了同盟国。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe, where the Allied Powers (including France) defeated the Central Powers.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，在第一次世界大战后期担任总理，是《凡尔赛条约》的主要制定者之一。
description.en: French statesman who served as Prime Minister during the latter part of World War I and was a principal architect of the Treaty of Versailles.

description.zh-cn: 法国左翼政党的联盟，包括法国共产党、社会党和激进党，于1936年赢得选举。
description.en: An alliance of left-wing movements in France, including the French Communist Party, the Socialist Party, and the Radical Party, which won the 1936 elections.

description.zh-cn: 法国社会主义政治家，三度担任法国总理，是人民阵线政府的领导人。
description.en: A French socialist politician who served as Prime Minister of France three times and was the leader of the Popular Front government.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙共和国派与佛朗哥领导的民族主义派之间的内战。
description.en: A civil war in Spain fought between the Republicans and the Nationalists led by Francisco Franco.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间德国入侵法国和低地国家的战役，导致法国的迅速溃败。
description.en: The German invasion of France and the Low Countries during the Second World War, which resulted in a swift French defeat.

description.zh-cn: 由夏尔·戴高乐在1940年法国沦陷后建立的流亡政府，旨在继续与轴心国作战。
description.en: The government-in-exile led by Charles de Gaulle after the fall of France in 1940, with the aim of continuing the fight against the Axis powers.

description.zh-cn: 法国将军和政治家，领导了自由法国运动，并在战后成为法兰西第五共和国的创始人。
description.en: French general and statesman who led the Free French Forces and later founded the French Fifth Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1870年9月4日，在拿破仑三世于色当战役被俘后，莱昂·甘必大领导的巴黎代表宣布成立临时国防政府，开启了第三共和国。
description.en: On September 4, 1870, after Napoleon III was captured at the Battle of Sedan, Paris deputies led by Léon Gambetta proclaimed a provisional Government of National Defense, beginning the Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第二帝国在1870年的普法战争中崩溃。
description.en: The Second French Empire collapsed during the Franco-Prussian War in 1870.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第三共和国是在法兰西第二帝国于普法战争中崩溃后建立的。
description.en: The French Third Republic was established following the collapse of the Second French Empire in the Franco-Prussian War.

description.zh-cn: 1940年的法国战役导致法国被纳粹德国击败，直接促成了法兰西第三共和国的终结。
description.en: The Battle of France in 1940 led to France's defeat by Nazi Germany, directly causing the end of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在法国战役中击败法国，导致法兰西第三共和国垮台，并随后成立了维希法国。
description.en: Nazi Germany defeated France in the Battle of France, leading to the collapse of the Third Republic and the subsequent establishment of Vichy France.

description.zh-cn: 维希法国的成立标志着法兰西第三共和国的正式终结，菲利普·贝当被授予全部权力。
description.en: The establishment of Vichy France marked the official end of the Third Republic, with full powers granted to Philippe Pétain.

description.zh-cn: 阿道夫·梯也尔是法兰西第三共和国的首任总统。
description.en: Adolphe Thiers was the first President of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1871年5月，阿道夫·梯也尔领导的政府血腥镇压了巴黎公社。
description.en: In May 1871, the government led by Adolphe Thiers brutally suppressed the Paris Commune.

description.zh-cn: 在帕特里斯·麦克马洪的指挥下，法国正规军在“血腥周”期间摧毁了巴黎公社。
description.en: Under the command of Patrice de MacMahon, the French regular army succeeded in crushing the Paris Commune during the 'Bloody Week'.

description.zh-cn: 帕特里斯·麦克马洪于1873年5月当选为共和国总统，任期至1879年1月。
description.en: Patrice de MacMahon was elected President of the Republic in May 1873 and served until January 1879.

description.zh-cn: 1898年1月，作家埃米尔·左拉发表了一封措辞激烈的公开信为德雷福斯辩护，向政府施加压力，要求重新审理此案。
description.en: In January 1898, writer Émile Zola published a strongly worded open letter in defense of Dreyfus, pressuring the government to reopen the case.

description.zh-cn: 该法律正式将教会与国家分离，所有教堂财产被没收，宗教人员不再由国家支付工资，严重打击了天主教会的地位。
description.en: This law officially separated church and state, confiscated all church property, and stopped state payment of clerical salaries, severely impacting the position of the Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 为了孤立德国，法国于1894年与俄罗斯帝国缔结了法俄同盟，这一军事联盟成为法国外交政策的基石。
description.en: To isolate Germany, France entered into the Franco-Russian Alliance with the Russian Empire in 1894, a military alliance that became a cornerstone of French foreign policy.

description.zh-cn: 1904年，法国与英国签署了《英法协约》，结束了两国长期的紧张关系，建立了一种非正式的联盟以对抗德国。
description.en: In 1904, France signed the Entente Cordiale with Great Britain, ending a long period of tension and establishing an informal alliance against Germany.

description.zh-cn: 乔治·克列孟梭自1917年起领导联合政府，以其坚定的决心推动法国赢得第一次世界大战的胜利。
description.en: From 1917, Georges Clemenceau led a coalition government, pushing France towards victory in World War I with his strong determination.

description.zh-cn: 莱昂·布鲁姆是1936年成立的人民阵线政府的总理。
description.en: Léon Blum was the Prime Minister of the Popular Front government formed in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 由于总理莱昂·布鲁姆拒绝按照共产党的要求积极干预西班牙内战，人民阵线联盟最终分崩离析。
description.en: The Popular Front coalition eventually fell apart due to Prime Minister Léon Blum's refusal to actively intervene in the Spanish Civil War as demanded by the Communists.

description.zh-cn: 在1940年法国沦陷后，夏尔·戴高乐将军发出了“6月18日呼吁”，号召法国人继续抵抗，并建立了自由法国流亡政府。
description.en: After the fall of France in 1940, General Charles de Gaulle issued the Appeal of 18 June, calling on the French to continue the fight and establishing the Free French government-in-exile.

description.zh-cn: 自由法国是与菲利普·贝当的维希法国敌对的政府。
description.en: Free France was a rival government to Philippe Pétain's Vichy France.
